author: Paul Johnson
comment: Update: Thanks for adding suggestions, now the best calc app in my opinion.... This a very good, simple calculator. It is the one I would use. But without a decimal point it is not useful. Lots of potential, Please add decimal point. My suggestion is tap on display to delete a digit, hold on the display to delete all. Then the clear button could be changed to a decimal button.

reply.author: Satheesh Kumar CyB
reply.content:
Thank you for your suggestion.
I will update it soon.

title: Perfect

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: This would be a very good app. I really like the idea behind it, it just simply doesn't work. Up and down swipes are unreliable! They work only 2 times of 6 attempts!

author: Charles Kirby
comment: good when you only need a simple calculator. works ok on my moto 360. the numbers are not too close to the edge of the watch face, so that pressing an outer number does not take you to another screen as some do. where is the decimal point? can't do much without it. fix this for more stars
title: moto 360

author: Harsh Bhanvadia
comment: 4 stars as number layout is not like ISO standards in numpad and calculators, and one more it crash if done like this .0..*. It should not allow to enter more than 1 decimal point. By this it would be fixed
title: Nice wear calc

author: Siju Samuel
comment: Don't waste time to download this bullshit app.
title: Bullshit
